setting.location: Forum Romanum, central plaza between marble temples
setting.weather: Blazing clear day with intense heat, no clouds

characters.appearance: Roman courtier in his thirties, nervous expression, perspiring face showing fear of imperial displeasure
characters.clothing: White toga with gold embroidered border, expensive but wilting in heat, jeweled sandals
characters.position: Hurrying across Forum toward imperial palace, carrying sealed message
characters.action: Racing to deliver news to Nero's court, desperate to avoid emperor's wrath, shielding scroll from blazing sun

scene.mainElements: Vast marble plaza with harsh vertical shadows from columns, gleaming white temple facades reflecting blinding light, bronze statues creating dark shadows
scene.details: Heat waves shimmering above hot marble pavement, bleached colors in intense sunlight, minimal shadows directly beneath objects, stone too hot to touch comfortably, bronze fittings too bright to look at directly, few people seeking shade under porticoes, dust hanging motionless in still air
scene.background: Imperial palace on Palatine Hill looming over forum, basilicas where senators plot in whispers, distant smoke from Nero's building projects wavering in heat haze
scene.atmosphere: Oppressive heat reflecting imperial tyranny, blinding light like Nero's absolute power, wise citizens hiding from both sun and emperor's gaze, air thick with fear and heat

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing vast sun-baked plaza with small human figure
composition.focus: Lone figure crossing blazing marble expanse toward shade
composition.depth: Foreground glaring marble pavement, middle ground hurrying figure with minimal shadow, background temple facades bleached white in harsh light
